name: NightSlimeJumper
description:
Ho to play: Click the left mouse button and drag it down in order to stretch the earthworm which will slingshoot the slime on top into the air after releasing the left mouse button. Now you can control the horizontal position of the slime. If you touch a leave from the bottom, it will break and you will receive one point. As you fly up into the air, you will get slower and in order to get faster again, just let the slime fall ontop of a leave. If you fall out of the screen at the bottom, you will DIE!

This game was made for the "Friday Night Game Jam - #2020-37" in 3 hours and everything was made by myself (which is obvious from this bad art :D). 

Hope you have at least a little fun playing it :) If someone is interested, here are the colors i generated for this game: https://coolors.co/141b41-b8c480-156064-f67e7d-ea7af4
